nodes.documentation:
EXISTENCE CHECK FUNCTIONS----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
That is to say one enters the characteristics of the searched object and the function returns a uint which is the id
0 if the object does not exist
WARNING ids start at 1 !
